Consider theentire field definition when enabling suggesters.Choose analyzers７ NoteIf you need to work around the analyzer constraint, for example if you need akeyword or ngram analyzer for certain query scenarios, you should use twoseparate fields for the same content.
This will allow one of the fields to have asuggester, while the other can be set up with a custom analyzer configuration.Create using the portalIn the REST API, add suggesters through Create Index or Update Index.JSONIn C#, define a SearchSuggester object. Suggesters is a collection on a SearchIndexobject, but it can only take one item. Add a suggester to the index definition.
